Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails. Review feedback from @lvdn-1 regarding the environment concept. Make necessary adjustments to the design.
Focus on prop designs. Identify a few key props that would be essential to the game's world and gameplay – weapons, tools, furniture, etc.
Sketch different variations of each prop, exploring different shapes, sizes, and materials. Consider their function and how they would be used within the game world.
Research and gather reference images of real-world props that are similar to the ones I'm designing. Pay attention to details, construction, and materials.
Refine the prop sketches, adding more detail and considering their interaction with the environment and characters. Ensure they fit the overall art style of the game.
Choose one prop to develop further. Create a more detailed concept drawing, including multiple views and detailed material callouts.
Email @tart-1 with the detailed prop concept, asking for feedback on its technical feasibility and potential challenges for implementation. Subject: Prop Concept Feedback
Continue working on color palette explorations for the prop designs. Ensure they complement the overall color scheme of the game and reflect the materials and function of the props.
Save all work and organize files. Review progress for the day and plan for tomorrow.
